mapper.update: UPDATE news_notice SET use_yn = 'N', mod_id = #{modId}, mod_time = NOW() WHERE news_no = #{newsNo};
UPDATE file_upload SET use_yn = 'N', mod_id = #{modId}, mod_time = NOW() WHERE file_name = #{currentFileName}

UPDATE news_notice SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, grade = #{grade}, category = #{category}, file_name = #{fileName}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, mod_id = #{modId}, mod_time = NOW() WHERE news_no = #{newsNo};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO news_notice( news_no, title, content, grade, category, file_name, start_date, end_date, reg_id, reg_time, mod_id, mod_time, use_yn ) VALUES ( CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(5), #{title}, #{content}, #{grade}, #{category}, #{fileName}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{regId}, NOW(), #{modId}, NOW(), 'Y' );
mapper.select: SELECT nn.news_no newsNo, nn.title, nn.content, nn.grade, nn.category, DATE_FORMAT(nn.start_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') startDate, DATE_FORMAT(nn.end_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') endDate, nn.use_yn useYn, e.emp_name empName, e.emp_no empNo, nn.file_name fileName FROM news_notice nn LEFT JOIN employee e ON nn.reg_id = e.emp_no LEFT JOIN file_upload fu ON fu.file_name = nn.file_name AND fu.use_yn = 'Y' WHERE nn.news_no = #{newsNo}
